alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 2:12PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lake and northern Cook Counties through 300 PM CST... At 211 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elgin, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waukegan, Arlington Heights, Palatine, Hoffman Estates, Buffalo Grove, Bartlett, Streamwood, Wheeling, Northbrook, North Chicago, Gurnee, Mundelein, Highland Park, Vernon Hills, Libertyville, Lake Zurich, Lake Forest and Barrington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
